body_html: Hi @concretevitamin , sorry for the delay. I have tried adding a wrapper to the function in sparse_ops.py. What is the general procedure to register it in case it is only a python op and doesn't have a corresponding kernel op ? I couldn't find something similar done before. Could you please help me here ? Thanks and sorry for many questions. It is my first attempt to contribute here.

body: Hi @concretevitamin , sorry for the delay. I have tried adding a wrapper to the function in `sparse_ops.py`. What is the general procedure to register it in case it is only a python op and doesn't have a corresponding kernel op ? I couldn't find something similar done before. Could you please help me here ? Thanks and sorry for many questions. It is my first attempt to contribute here.
